news.description: Congrats to Aline for being selected for the American Geophysical Union's (AGU) 2025-2026 Voices for Science cohort!
New Publication in Environmental Research Letters: Greta's work about green spaces and all-cause mortality in 1041 cities!
Congrats to Greta for winning 1st place at the GWU Post-doc Appreciation Day Science Communication Contest!
Kelvin spoke at NYCFPA's panel on climate justice and resilience in Washington DC.
New Publication in Springer Nature: Alex's work on metrics of urbanicity and rurality!
LEAPH members, Alex and Tsz Kin, receive ISES 2025 travel awards!
LEAPH attends ISES ISEE 2025 in Atlanta!
Ahmed presents his final summer research project for HEI peers!
Farewell and good luck to Ahmed and Medha as they wrap up their summer with LEAPH!
Kelvin spoke as a panelist at Environmental Law Institute's webinar on Environmental Justice, Extreme Heat, and the Future of Energy Assistance Programs in the United States.
LEAPH outing to the American Geophysical Union headquarters!
Welcoming Aline Maybank and Medha Kurukunda!
Welcoming Summer HEI Fellow Ahmed Shah!
Congrats to Greta Martin on winning the GWSPH Doctoral Dissertation Award!
New Publication in Atmospheric Environment: Tsz Kin's work on SO2 monitoring gaps in Saint John NB!
New Publication in Lancet Planetary Health: Greta's analysis on urban nature targets in C40 cities!
Tsz Kin successfully defends his MSc thesis. Well done!
Kelvin gave an invited presentation at Society of Toxicology Annual Meeting.
Tsz Kin, Aline, and Kelvin attend NASA Health and Air Quality Applied Sciences Team (HAQAST) Meeting.
Kelvin presents at AGU2024 on NO2 exposures among immigrants in the US.
Welcoming research assistants Ana, Ellie, Katy, and Vaibhav!
Alumna Aline completed a NCEI/NASA DEVELOP summer internship on Vermont Wildland Fires. Congrats, Aline!
Team members presented our recent research at ISEE2024.
Alumnus Ty received the Killam Fellowship to study at the University of Washington this coming academic year. Congrats, Ty!
Corey and Niyati recently joined our group. Welcome!
Kelvin received the Cross-Disciplinary Research Fund to explore pediatric asthma disparities related to environmental exposures.
Tsz Kin presented his work on nitrogen dioxide at HAQAST 2024!
Kelvin wins Research Innovation Award from GWSPH to advance green space assessment in epidemiology.
Tsz Kin successfully defends his MSc proposal. Congrats!
New paper co-authored by Kelvin Fong on Satellite Data for Environmental Justice!
LEAPH moves to George Washington University in Washington, DC!
BSc Honours student Aline has graduated and just started her MPH at Yale! Congrats and good luck, Aline!
Congrats to Alex Del Favero-Campbell for winning the Scotia Scholar Doctoral Award!
We attended and Kelvin Fong gave a plenary on the future of epidemiology and biostatistics research at the CSEB 2023 Conference in Halifax.
We attended and presented at the inaugural ISEE-NAC Conference!
Aline Maybank presents her Medical Sciences  thesis project!
Ty Martin wins Best Poster at Dalhousie Integrated Sciences Program (DISP) Research Day!
Kelvin Fong speaks at Atlantic Air Quality & Health Workshop.
Kelvin Fong named one of Research Nova Scotiaâ€™s New Health Investigators.
We attend ISEE2022 in Athens, Greece! ISEE2022.
